mapper.delete: delete from dictionarydetail where Id=#{dictId}; delete from dictionarytype where Id=#{dictId};
mapper.update:
update dictionarytype
Name=#{type},
ItemKey=#{itemKey},
ModificationDate=#{modificationDate},
Modifier=#{modifier},
where Id=#{dictId}; update dictionarydetail
ItemKey=#{itemKey},
ItemKey=#{itemValue},
IsDefault=#{isDefault},
SortNum=#{sortNum},
ModificationDate=#{modificationDate},
Modifier=#{modifier},
where Id=#{dictId};
mapper.select: select d.Id, d.ItemKey, d.ItemValue, t.`Name`, d.SortNum, d.IsDefault, d.CreationDate, d.Creator, d.ModificationDate, d.Modifier from dictionarydetail as d left join dictionarytype as t on d.ItemKey=t.ItemKey where d.Id=#{dictId}
